channel.title: Clean exit on Alt-F4
channel.description:
Currently, alt-f4 crashes the game and one must go through the "not responding" dialog to exit.
Yes, I know, there's an exit button. However, it is standard practice for applications to exit cleanly on alt-f4, and many people (including me) use this method a lot.
